Toledo.First Church of Christ, Scientist (Toled: The former First Church of Christ, Scientist, located at 2704 Monroe Street, in Toledo, Ohio, is an historic building built in 1898. It was added to the National Register of Historic Places in 1978, at which date the building was Universal Community Church. First Church of Christ, Scientist, Toledo, now holds services at 4647 West Central Avenue at Corey Road in Ottawa Hills.
